word_mean_info__list.difference: 指在程度上相差很小，差不多。
多用于书面语，指精确度接近某个标准以致误差可忽略不计。
常可分almost和nearly换用，但about用于表示时间、数量的“大约”时，实际数量可能多也可能少。
与almost含义基本相同，侧重指数量、时间或空间上的接近。
多用于非正式场合，常见于美国英语。

word_group.brief_definition: 大体说来；大致来讲；粗略地讲

bilingual.source: The cost of the repairs will be roughly $500.
There are roughly 50 people attending the meeting.
bilingual.target: 参加会议的人数大约有50人。

bilingual.source: The project will take roughly two weeks to complete.
bilingual.target: 这个项目大约需要两周时间完成。

bilingual.source: One dollar is roughly the equivalent of seven yuan.
bilingual.target: 一美元的等价物大约是七元人民币。

bilingual.source: A kilometer is roughly the equivalent of 0.62 miles.
bilingual.target: 一公里大约是0.62英里的等价物。

bilingual.source: The distance between the two cities is roughly 300 miles.
bilingual.target: 两个城市之间的距离大约是300英里。

bilingual.source: One kilogram of water is roughly the equivalent of one liter.
bilingual.target: 一公斤的水大约是1升的当量。

bilingual.source: Do you know how many gigabytes a high-definition movie roughly requires?
bilingual.target: 你知道一部高清电影大约需要多少技嘉吗？

bilingual.source: Roughly 90% of nearly 170 studies favored the sponsor's interest.
bilingual.target: 在近170项研究中，大约90%的研究都是迎合赞助商利益。

list.abstract: roughly，英文单词，副词，作副词时意为“大略地；概略地”。

yingyinNormal.en: Problem B, is this journey is going to take me roughly 50 days to complete.
yingyinNormal.zh: 问题二，完整走这一趟要花掉我大约50天。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, Butch here eats about 90kg of foliage every day, which is roughly about that much hay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 布奇每天都要吃掉大约90公斤的草料，也就相当于这么多草。

yingyinNormal.en: Every single day, the human race produces around 70 billion farts, meaning roughly 10 of those are yours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每天人类大约放七百亿个屁，也就是说你一天会放十次屁。

yingyinNormal.en: And while 200 calories is an arbitrary number that we chose, a pound of fat is equivalent to roughly 3500 calories. So, burn away!
yingyinNormal.zh: 200大卡只是我们选的数字，一磅的脂肪大约等于3500大卡，所以，尽情燃烧热量。

yingyinNormal.en: Now roughly chop some spring onion, coriander and, finally, chives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 随手切几段葱、香菜，还有韭黄。

yingyinNormal.en: Add the tomato-ey sauce prepared earlier. Roughly chop some greens, spring onions and coriander.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加入先前准备好的蕃茄酱汁，粗粗切一些葱和香菜。

yingyinNormal.en: The Blooming Onion, for example, has about 2,000 calories, roughly an entire day's worth for an adult.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拿开花洋葱来说 它能提供2000卡路里的热量，这相当于一个成年人工作一天的消耗。

yingyinNormal.en: And then I need a hot wok. Crack the crab claws but leave the meat in the claws. Roughly chop a chilli.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后我要把锅烧热。敲碎蟹爪，但把肉留在爪子里。粗粗地切碎一只辣椒。

yingyinNormal.en: The average store has over 45,000 products on its shelves, and roughly a third of them are created using corn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 平均每家商店货架上有45000种产品，这其中几乎三分之一来自于玉米。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa. You mustn't play so roughly with George. He's only little. Sorry, Mummy. I was just trying to stop George's hiccups.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩琪，和乔治玩的时候不能这么粗暴啊，他还那么小。对不起妈妈，我只是想让乔治能够不再打嗝。

yingyinNormal.en: Sure, the average person who runs for a good 20 minutes will burn roughly 200 calories, but is that really the most fun way to do it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不置可否，平均一人跑20分钟，可消耗大概200卡路里，但这是燃烧卡路里最有趣的方法吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Don't play too roughly with Dino Roar, George. He has moving parts and might get broken. George cannot play with Dino Roar in the garden.
yingyinNormal.zh: 和轰鸣龙玩的时候不可以太粗鲁，乔治。他有一些活动零件很容易就弄坏的。乔治不能和轰鸣龙在花园里一起玩。

yingyinNormal.en: I say you tell Alex your heart belongs to Penny, I provide her a shoulder to cry on, and then roughly half a year later I give it to her good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得你应该告诉她，你只爱佩妮，然后我借肩膀给她哭诉，然后差不多半年后，我就能给她"来一发"了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm serving this with a vibrant jammy relish of grilled sweet red peppers from a jar, sweet chilli sauce and squeezed lime, all roughly blended together and ready in seconds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 蛋卷将搭配一种爽口的浓稠酱汁，一些灌装的烤红甜椒，加上甜辣酱，挤一点柠檬汁，再粗略地搅拌一下，酱汁就好了，马上就完成了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Nearly 40% of the <highlight>roughly</highlight> 350 people said, they had collaborated with artists, and almost all said they would consider doing so in future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约350人中有近40%的人说他们与艺术家合作过，而几乎所有人都说他们将来会考虑与艺术家合作。

examination_example.sentence: Those societies came out of the war with levels of enrollment that had been <highlight>roughly</highlight> constant at 3-5% of the relevant age groups.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些社会从战争中走出来，其入学率一直维持在适龄人群的3%-5%左右。

examination_example.sentence: At any given point, I should have deep work scheduled for <highlight>roughly</highlight> the next month.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何时刻，我都应该将此后大概一个月中的深度工作都规划好。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The decline of play is a special hazard for the <highlight>roughly</highlight> l in 5 children in the United States who live in poverty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对大概五分之一生活在贫困中的美国儿童来说，玩耍的减少是一种特殊的危险。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Roughly</highlight> the size of a soda can, sitting on a bookshelf, a relatively harmless gadget may be turning friends away from your home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个汽水罐大小，放在书架上，看起来相对无害的小工具可能会让朋友们远离你的家。

examination_example.sentence: Instead of bringing families together, Aderhold's letter revealed a divide in the district, which has 9,700 students, and one that broke down <highlight>roughly</highlight> along racial lines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿德霍尔德的信非没能让家长们团结起来，反而揭露了这个拥有9700名学生的学区存在的分歧，而且这种分歧大致是按照种族界限来划分的。
